Name: Gem Collector
About the game: Gem Collector is a puzzle/arcade game. Collect all gems spread around a level. Watch out for falling stones. Defeat enemies using power stone pushes or TNT. Use teleports to travel between level areas. Prove your creation skills using an intuitive Level Editor. Share your design with other players using one-click Level Publisher.
